Devilcat examines the map.  "It would seem to me that if we attack 
immediately, we catch the Maximals with their leader elsewhere.  Or, 
perhaps we could catch the leaders with the followers elsewhere and 
decapitate all three groups in one fell swoop."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Hydras had a 3d map of the world come up over the table. "The 
maximals and 
> the tripred have formed an alliance it seems..or they are trying 
to. 4 of my 
> old minions have joined them as well...but they are of no worry to 
me. What I 
> worry about is the Maximals. If you found it wiser we could attack 
the 
> maximal base first catching them off guard trying to strike down 
the head 
> before it has a chance to regroup...thought the tripred base would 
be for 
> susceptible to an attack."
